meanings.definition: Occur at the same time or place.
meanings.sent1: My birthday coincides with the start of summer break.
meanings.sent2: The meeting coincides with my lunch break.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how our vacations always coincide.
meanings.sent4: Her arrival coincides with the sunset, creating a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fireworks coincides with the burst of colors in the sky.

meanings.sent1: His values coincide with mine on this matter.
meanings.sent2: The evidence coincides with the witness's statement.
meanings.sent3: Their tastes in music always seem to coincide.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the painting coincide perfectly with the room decor.
meanings.sent5: The rhythm of the music coincides with the beating of my heart.
